channel.title: How do you make a new item?
channel.description: I want to make a admin only black mystic robe with silver trim instead of red. how would I do that? I want to keep the regular black mystic.

once you get the right programs such as something to put the edited model’s back in its easy, i already have a model editor,and extractor, just nothing to put back in but ill be planning on getting one.

item.title: How do you make a new item?
item.dc:creator: @Harleyscape_owner Harleyscape owner
item.description:
@Harleyscape_owner wrote:

Actual it is posible to create your own items but it is really hard to do, it is called model editing which you need a a model extracter, then something to put the new model’s back in, and the only people i seen do this is inzinz on rune-server, so yea or you can go in to the item.java and make the white mystic weild on the boots and then when you wear the red mystic and white mystic might look something like what you want.

Read full topic
